scenarios.starting_prompt: I have Comarch DMS and Optima. How can I automatically generate cost documents in Optima?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask if a ready example of such a 'generator' is available and where to find it.

scenarios.starting_prompt: What was the Operating Profit of the Comarch Group in Q4 2024? How does this compare to Q4 2023?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask for these values in thousand PLN and for the calculation of the percentage change (increase/decrease) year-on-year.

scenarios.starting_prompt: I want to use DMS on mobile devices, but I have a local, stationary version of ERP Optima (on-premise). Will this work correctly?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask if a demo version of the mobile DMS application is available for testing.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Is Comarch OCR capable of reading items on purchase invoices or warehouse documents?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask for an explanation of what Comarch OCR currently recognizes and when the feature for recognizing positions is planned.

scenarios.starting_prompt: What was the total sales revenue of the Comarch Group for the entire year 2024 (Q1-Q4) and how did this compare to 2023?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask for the value in thousand PLN and the percentage increase/decrease.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Can Comarch DMS integrate with ERP systems from other vendors, such as SAP Hana?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask if such integration is possible and what the scope of integration depends on.

scenarios.starting_prompt: I need to integrate Comarch DMS with an email inbox. Is this possible and where can I find configuration information?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Also ask if it is possible to connect more than one email inbox.

scenarios.starting_prompt: I would like to set up DMS to automatically generate emails with a list of documents for acceptance, but only once a day. Is this possible?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask if, after accepting one document, the system can automatically open the next one requiring acceptance.

scenarios.starting_prompt: What versions of ERP Optima and ERP XL are required for the newest version of Comarch DMS (2020.0.0) to work with?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Also ask what other Comarch ERP systems DMS cooperates with.

scenarios.starting_prompt: What was the Comarch Group's EBITDA in Q4 2024 (in thousand PLN) and what was the percentage increase compared to Q4 2023?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask what the EBITDA was for the whole year 2024 (Q1-Q4) and what the increase was compared to 2023.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Can Comarch DMS be used in smaller companies, such as accounting offices?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask for the justification of this possibility.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Who is the current CEO of Comarch S.A., and who is the CFO?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask for the name and surname of the Chairman of the Supervisory Board.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Does Comarch OCR recognize bank account numbers (IBAN) and data from scans of paper documents?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask what quality the scans must be for the OCR to work correctly.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Do I need a separate license to use DMS via the browser (web) than for the desktop application?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask on what basis Comarch DMS is licensed.

scenarios.starting_prompt: In the Commercial Bookkeeping module (KsiÄ™ga Handlowa) in Comarch ERP Optima, what are settlement accounts used for and what functionality was added in version 15.0?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask what the basic types of accounts in the program are.

scenarios.starting_prompt: What percentage of Comarch Group's revenue in Q4 2024 came from Poland, and what percentage came from the DACH region?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask for the total revenue in thousand PLN for Q4 2024.

scenarios.starting_prompt: How does Comarch DMS notify an employee about a document for realization if they are not logged into the application?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask if the notification can also appear on a phone.

scenarios.starting_prompt: In DMS, I want to set up the cost acceptance process so that the system checks if the budget is exceeded. Is this possible?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask which control is used to inform about and block the transfer of the document to the next stage.

scenarios.starting_prompt: Does Comarch DMS allow electronic signing of PDF documents with a qualified certificate?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask in which version this functionality was introduced and in which application it is available.

scenarios.starting_prompt: What is Comarch Data Warehouse Manager (DWM) and what is the ETL process used for in its context?
scenarios.conversation_plan: Ask if DWM supports loading data from JSON files and what the main directions of DWM development are.
